title: Migrating from Java 8 to Java 17 with OpenRewrite
content: In this article we will discuss on how to migrate Java applications from Java 8 to Java 17 using the OpenRewrite migration plugin. At the end of this tutorial, you will learn which are most common challenges that you can face when upgrading to Java 17 Java 8 to Java 17 challenges In pure project ...
